name: Codilized
description:
You wake up and your first impression is 'Wait this isn't my room it is quite claustrophobic'. Huh it looks like you are stuck in your laptop now aren't you.

WASD/arrow keys to move.

Z/O to dash.

beat the bosses to leave your laptop.

Else die there.

Huh there are 15 waves going through different places.finish them would ya.
